arabic_text: أَمۡ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ مَهِينٞ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُبِينُ
translation: (52) Or am I [not] better than this one [i.e., Moses] who is insignificant and hardly makes himself clear?[1442]
footnotes: [1442]- That was true previous to his appointment as a prophet, at which time Allāh corrected his speech impediment.
